title: PES RR CAMPUS CS AIML(MIGHT GET CS CORE IN ROUND 2 OF PESSAT OR KCET) OR MANIPAL MAIN CAMPUS CS CORE

comments.body:
If you can afford it, manipal no doubt.

Only take pes if you need the money and get it through kcet
if money doesn't matter manipal cse.
can u tell reason also pls?
if you want to live - MANIPAL

Manipal is just generally better and campus life is existent. Something you can't say for pes

But pes through kcet is like a quarter of the price

Good placements and mostly great campus life (v
Important)
academics wise both are abt the same, but college life wise mit is wayy better.
Academics and placements both are same ( FOR CS ONLY ) . But college life would be better in Manipal if your parents allow it
Manipal Main CS. Check this subreddit's last few posts for why, people discussed this as recently as a few days ago
